downloadTitle: Oracle Estate Assessment Tools for Migration to SQL Server
downloadDescription: A set of scripts to to help with the collection of information for migration assessment across a large Oracle estate.
detailsSection:
Collecting assessment information across a large data estate is a large manual effort. To optimize this process, we have created a set of scripts to collect both Pre-SSMA information (high level CSV information) and SSMA projects.

Each set of scripts consist of a PowerShell script that is the main execution engine, an Excel spreadsheet that allows the customer to provide required details about each Oracle server and either SQL scripts (Pre-SSMA) or an xml script (for SSMAConsole) to do the actual commands to collect the required information/SSMA project.
systemRequirementsSection: The file is a zipped folder that contains the scripts. To run the SSMA collection script, you will need to install the latest SSMA for Oracle.
installInstructionSection: Choose the Download button on this page to start the download. Unzip the folder on a Windows machine and customize the PowerShell (.ps1) scripts as required for your local environment. Enter your server information in the Excel spreadsheet and run the utility.
